 Long leasehold for a term of 999 years at a peppercorn ground rent

displayAddress: Caffè Nero, 16 St Anns Square, Manchester M2 7HQ
propertySubType: Retail and Leisure Retail and Leisure
detailedDescription: Prime retail investment in Manchester City Centre Manchester has established itself as the capital of the north, being the largest financial and business centre outside of London, with the economy doubling in value over the last 20 years with a £62bn GVA The city boasts the largest student population within Europe spread across four universities with a population of over 100,000 students St Ann’s Square is considered as one of Manchester City Centres most historic and recognisable public spaces and sits within the heart of the prime retail core The square serves as a key pedestrian throughfare, connecting Deansgate, New Cathedral Street and the Arndale Shopping Centre attracting approximately 30,000 pedestrians on weekends The property comprises a ground floor retail unit and forms part of four storey building of traditional brick construction under a pitched roof. Total floor area of 2,768 sq ft (841 sq ft ITZA) Let to Nero Holdings Limited t/a Caffé Nero 10-year FRI lease wef 15 March 2024, expiring on 14 March 2034 (subject to tenant break option on the sixth anniversary) £80,000 per annum (£95 psf ITZA) on 15 March 2028 Rent to be reviewed on 15 March 2029 on a OMRV basis New long leasehold title for a term of 999 years at peppercorn

displayAddress: Withers Court, Chipping Norton, Oxfordshire OX7 5AB
propertySubType: Retail and Leisure Retail and Leisure
detailedDescription: Highly reversionary prime retail and residential investment in Chipping Norton, Oxfordshire. Chipping Norton is a charming market town in Oxfordshire, approximately 20 miles north west of Oxford, 30 miles to the east of Gloucester and 65 miles northwest of London. The immediate locality is made up of attractive period era buildings and provide a mix of commercial and residential dwellings. The property comprises a terrace of high street retail premises of between 3 - 4 storeys, upper floor residential apartment and a separate light industrial workshop to the rear. The ownership includes Your Co-Op food store and parking to the rear (sold off LLH). Total site area of 2.25 acres. Total gross internal floor area of 20,053 sq ft. Let to 9 tenants including The Sue Ryder Care, QD Market Towns and other independent businesses / private individuals. Vendor to provide 12 month rental top ups on the vacant units. AWULT of 3.7 years to expiry, 0.85 years to breaks. Total topped up rental income of £193,200 per annum. Estimated rental value of £297,500 per annum. Freehold

displayAddress: Fluidpower Group UP Limited, Caddick Road, Knowsley, Liverpool L34 9HP
detailedDescription: HQ industrial sale and leaseback investment in Knowsley, Merseyside. Knowsley is an established industrial location in the Northwest. Excellent transport communications, with easy access onto Junction 4 of the M57 Motorway, which connects A580 East Lancs Road with M62 Motorway. Industrial premises providing a total gross internal floor area of 30,321 sq ft. The property occupies a total site area of 1.45 acres. From completion the property will be let to Fluidpower Group UK Limited. Fluidpower manufactures and distributes fluid power components and have owner occupied the site since 2012. 10 year lease term from completion. Initial rent of £171,640 per annum (£5.66 psf). 5 yearly upward only rent reviews to RPI annually compounded (1-3% collar and cap). Tenant option to determine on the anniversary of 5th year (subject to break penalty of 6 months rent). Freehold.
